title: Introducing: Babybats
body:
Comprised of producer Bill Lefler (Ingrid Michaelson, Dashboard Confessional, Gym Class Heroes) and vocalist Jasmine Ash (Oh Darling, Gold & The Invisible Girl), LA outfit **Babybats** craft sugary sweet ‘quirky’ pop.

With four tracks online so far, and an EP out later in the year, there’s little / nothing online as of yet in terms of Facebook/Twitter/Soundcloud, just a [Bandcamp](http://babybats.bandcamp.com/track/always-be-the-same) page. Somewhere between the killer synth pop of **CHVRCHES** and the moreish, danceable vibe of latest blog sensations **Sylvan Esso**, these quartet of tracks are just crying out for some Hype Machine love.
